actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to permit the National Railroad Passenger Corporation to make a determination of public convenience and necessity with respect to certain railroad property abandonment.

summary.text: Requires that agreements between the Secretary of Transportation and the trustees of railroads in reorganization for emergency assistance to such railroads under the Regional Rail Reorganization Act must provide that rail properties on which rail service was discontinued within three years prior to the enactment of this Act will not be abandoned if the National Railroad Passenger Corporation determines that further passenger rail service on such property is required by the public convenience and necessity.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to permit the National Railroad Passenger Corporation to make a determination of public convenience and necessity with respect to certain railroad property abandonment.
